Dr. Jayavrinda,Dr. Monika Goyal, Dr. Piyali Datta, Dr. Arun Raman, Mr. Pradeep Kumar, Mr. Raghavendra, Mrs. Mary Jasmine, Mr. Udayabhaskara, Mrs. Swetha C B, Ms. Aparajita Sinha, Mrs. Mitha Guru, Rakshita R, Dr. Vinutha N, Mr. Jeevaraj R, Mrs. Pavithra A, Ayain John, Prof. J Rajalekshmi, Dr. Arijit Das
Her research interests are ML approach to speech processing, energy forecasting and application of ML in the area of behavioural science.

Her primary research interest areas are Medical Image processing, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Data Science. I proposed different image contrast enhancement algorithms for improving the quality of raw medical MRI images especially for the brain MRI images and I also developed Auto contrast enhancer, Brain tumour detection and classification model based on deep transfer learning and pre trained models Inception V3 and Google net-.

Her current research interests include Microfluidics, Algorithms, VLSI design, and Machine learning. She has proposed several CoDesign algorithms for different platforms of microfluidic biochips. She has published research articles in 9 SCI indexed journals and more than 20 International conference proceedings. She presented papers in 12 International conferences.

He received his Masters in Systems and Control Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology Bombay in 2012, following which he worked in (what was then) General Electric (GE) Oil & Gas in the Gas Turbine and Compressor Controls Team for a couple of years.
His areas of interest include Embedded systems, Internet of Tings, 3 D modelling, Python Programming (AIML & DS), MEMS, Analog & Digital Circuits, Batteries, Solar Circuits, App development etc.
His research interests are network security, cyber security and cloud computing.
Her areas of research interest are Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and its applications.

He has also written a dissertation on algorithms used in NLP for sentiment analysis of large scale data and also was part of independent project that concentrated on image enhancement using machine learning to improve light & shadow of foreground object. His area of interest include AI&ML,Digital image processing, Digital signal processing, Computational philosophy.

Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
What did one wall say to the other wall? I'll meet you at the corner!
Why don't eggs tell jokes? Because they might crack up!
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.
